objects.text:
• MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND
• 100+ HOURS WIRELESS PLAYTIME
• RUGGED & FOLDABLE DESIGN
• WIRELESS CHARGING

product_details.description: True icons never die; they just get better with time. Major V is no different. From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined. Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure. MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND: Thunderous bass, smooth mids and crisp treble. Major V delivers the Marshall signature sound you know and love. 100+ HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYTIME: Your next adventure awaits, and Major V is in for the ride. Packing 100+ hours of wireless playtime, you can be gone for days. RUGGED AND FOLDABLE DESIGN: Rugged so that it lasts. Foldable for compact storage. Major is an instant classic for the fifth time running. CUSTOMISABLE M-BUTTON: Instantly access the Spotify Tap default function or your EQ settings or voice assistant thanks to Major V’s M-button and the Marshall Bluetooth app WIRELESS CHARGING: We don’t like wires either, they just get in the way. Thanks to wireless charging, it’s simple to give Major V a boost when needed. Brand - Marshall ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - On Ear ** Form Factor - On Ear ** Noise Control - None **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and tech-savvy design that promotes a Bluetooth headphone product. It is divided into two halves using a geometric, grid-based layout. On the left, the brand and product name (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) are prominently displayed in bold, uppercase fonts. Just below them sits a compact tag line (`subheading`) in a sleek, futuristic style. A product features list (`description`) is neatly formatted with bullet points, followed by the price (`price`) in extra-large typography. The call-to-action button, composed of a rectangle (`cta_background`) and overlaying text (`cta`), appears just below. The right half showcases the product image (`product_image`) on a clean, structured background.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Deep Navy: `#1E3D59`  
- Steel Blue: `#2B5278`  
- Light Gray: `#C0C0C0`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`  
- Accent Blue (for CTA text): `#1E3D59`
product_color: The product image features premium black Marshall headphones with a sleek, textured finish. The dominant color is matte black (#1C1C1C), used for the headband, ear cups, and frame, imparting a bold and sophisticated look. The textured panel on the ear cup has a slightly lighter black shade (#2A2A2A), adding depth and contrast. The brand logo appears in crisp white (#FFFFFF), standing out clearly against the black background for visibility. A metallic gold accent (#D4AF37) on the side control knob adds a touch of luxury. The colors blend seamlessly through subtle contrasts, while maintaining distinct highlights for emphasis and brand identity.
